map marker pin About us 
All items on our menu are made from scratch daily. We hand select each ingredient to make each plate explodes with flavor. Our menu is uniquely ours and features amazing recipes from our family gatherings. Whatever you order, you'll quickly see why we're known for our modern interpretation of classic dishes and our insistence on using only fresh, high-quality ingredients. We are able to customize many items on our menu to ensure your food experience is amazing. We offer take-out and dine-in options and are able to cater to large parties with advance notice.

Reviews

review by - Yelp

Cheryl M:

Food and service were awesome. We had the best beef Pad See Ew. We wished we lived closer as we would be here every week! Yummy.

review by - Yelp

Madison R:

Amazing! This is my go-go when I am sick or just in the mood for some comfort food. We LOVE the green curry!

review by - Yelp

John B:

This is the best Thai place in the area. I have been to Thailand 7 times and this place is closest to authentic taste in my opinion. Overall good Thai food and excellent service.

review by - Yelp

Saint S:

I love you Taste of Thai never change. Best pad Thai and coconut soup in the city. Been a fan for years. Never had a bad experience.

review by - Yelp

Jessica B:

I loved everything I got 5/5 most definitely. The yellow curry, curry poppers and the stir fry was so good my family loved it definitely will be returning
